    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller
    Provides Classes that cumpute brat specific operations such as de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller.BratAjaxCasController#getDocumentResponse(String, String)....
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.project
    Support for project definition such as checking appropriate project name, if a user is a project admin and so on
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.util
    Utility classes for brat annotation/curation/correction
